articles.title: Texas power grid faces summer having changed little from February freeze - Reuters
articles.description: Texas's grid operator frightened residents last week when it said it had very little reserves to cover demand spiking as temperatures soared. This summer could produce more scary times.

articles.title: Supreme Court Kills The Fannie And Freddie Preferred Trade - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac preferred and common shares were wiped out after Treasury bailouts, yet some had hope of litigation. However, this hope seems to be fading. Read more here.
